subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: Locked out for the third time in his N.H.L. career, Jaromir Jagr received a heartfelt welcome Wednesday in Prague as he suited up for the Czech Extraliga franchise he now owns.
snippet: Locked out for the third time in his N.H.L. career, Jaromir Jagr received a heartfelt welcome Wednesday in Prague as he suited up for the Czech Extraliga franchise he now owns.
